verses.verse: For the divisions <S%H4256><s%> of the gatekeepers <S%H7778><s%> [there were] of the Korahites, <S%H7145><s%> Meshelemiah <S%H4920><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kore, <S%H6981><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Asaph. <S%H623><s%>

And Meshelemiah <S%H4920><s%> had sons: <S%H1121><s%> Zechariah <S%H2148><s%> the first-born, Jediael <S%H3043><s%> the second, <S%H8145><s%> Zebadiah <S%H2069><s%> the third, <S%H7992><s%> Jathniel <S%H3496><s%> the fourth, <S%H7243><s%>
Elam <S%H9405><s%> the fifth, <S%H2549><s%> Johanan <S%H3076><s%> the sixth, <S%H8345><s%> Eliehoenai <S%H9018><s%> the seventh. <S%H7637><s%>

And Obed-edom had sons: <S%H1121><s%> Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%> the first-born, Jehozabad <S%H3075><s%> the second, <S%H8145><s%> Joah <S%H3098><s%> the third, <S%H7992><s%> Sacar <S%H7940><s%> the fourth, <S%H7243><s%> Nethanel <S%H5417><s%> the fifth, <S%H2549><s%>

Ammiel <S%H5988><s%> the sixth, <S%H8345><s%> Issachar <S%H3485><s%> the seventh, <S%H7637><s%> [and] Peullethai <S%H6469><s%> the eighth; <S%H8066><s%> God <S%H430><s%> had indeed <S%H3588><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> him.

Also to his son <S%H1121><s%> Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> were born <S%H3205><s%> who ruled <S%H4474><s%> over the house <S%H1004><s%> of their father, for they were mighty <S%H1><s%> men <S%H1368><s%> of valor. <S%H1368><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%> [were] Othni, <S%H6273><s%> Rephael, <S%H7501><s%> Obed, <S%H5744><s%> and Elzabad, <S%H443><s%> whose brothers, <S%H251><s%> Elihu <S%H453><s%> and Semachiah, <S%H5565><s%> were valiant <S%H2428><s%> men. <S%H1121><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> [were] of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Obed-edom; they and their sons <S%H1121><s%> and their relatives <S%H251><s%> [were] able <S%H2428><s%> men <S%H376><s%> with strength <S%H3581><s%> for the service, <S%H5656><s%> 62 <S%H8346><s%> <S%H8147><s%> from Obed-edom.
And Meshelemiah <S%H4920><s%> had sons <S%H1121><s%> and relatives, <S%H251><s%> 18 <S%H8083><s%> <S%H6240><s%> valiant <S%H2428><s%> men. <S%H1121><s%>

Also Hosah, <S%H2621><s%> [one] of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari <S%H4847><s%> had sons: <S%H1121><s%> Shimri <S%H8113><s%> the first <S%H7218><s%> (although <S%H3588><s%> he was not the first-born <S%H7218><s%>, his father made <S%H1><s%> him first),

Hilkiah <S%H2518><s%> the second, <S%H8145><s%> Tebaliah <S%H2882><s%> the third, <S%H7992><s%> Zechariah <S%H2148><s%> the fourth; <S%H7243><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> and relatives <S%H251><s%> of Hosah <S%H2621><s%> [were] 13. <S%H7969><s%> <S%H6240><s%>

To these <S%H428><s%> divisions <S%H4256><s%> of the gatekeepers, <S%H7778><s%> the chief <S%H7218><s%> men, <S%H1397><s%> [were given] duties <S%H4931><s%> like <S%H5980><s%> their relatives <S%H251><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

And they cast <S%H5307><s%> lots, <S%H1486><s%> the small <S%H9512><s%> and the great <S%H1419><s%> alike, according to their fathers' households, <S%H1004><s%> for every <S%H8179><s%> gate. <S%H8179><s%>

And the lot <S%H1486><s%> to the east <S%H4217><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> to Shelemiah. <S%H8018><s%> Then they cast <S%H5307><s%> lots <S%H1486><s%> [for] his son <S%H1121><s%> Zechariah, <S%H2148><s%> a counselor <S%H3289><s%> with insight, <S%H7922><s%> and his lot <S%H1486><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> out to the north. <S%H6828><s%>
For Obed-edom [it fell] to the south, <S%H5045><s%> and to his sons <S%H1121><s%> went the storehouse. <S%H624><s%>

For Shuppim <S%H8206><s%> and Hosah <S%H2621><s%> [it was] to the west, <S%H4628><s%> by the gate <S%H8179><s%> of Shallecheth, <S%H7996><s%> on the ascending <S%H5927><s%> highway. <S%H4546><s%> Guard <S%H4929><s%> corresponded <S%H5980><s%> to guard. <S%H4929><s%>

On the east <S%H4217><s%> there were six <S%H8337><s%> Levites, <S%H3881><s%> on the north <S%H6828><s%> four <S%H702><s%> daily, <S%H3117><s%> on the south <S%H5045><s%> four <S%H702><s%> daily, <S%H3117><s%> and at the storehouse <S%H624><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> by two. <S%H8147><s%>
At the Parbar <S%H6503><s%> on the west <S%H4628><s%> [there were] four <S%H702><s%> at the highway <S%H4546><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> at the Parbar. <S%H6503><s%>
These <S%H428><s%> were the divisions <S%H4256><s%> of the gatekeepers <S%H7778><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Korah <S%H7145><s%> and of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari. <S%H4847><s%>

And the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> their relatives, <S%H251><s%> had charge <S%H5921><s%> of the treasures <S%H214><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> and of the treasures <S%H214><s%> of the dedicated <S%H6944><s%> gifts. <S%H6944><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ladan, <S%H3936><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the Gershonites <S%H1649><s%> belonging to Ladan, <S%H3936><s%> [namely,] the Jehielites, <S%H3172><s%> [were] the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers' [households], belonging to Ladan <S%H3936><s%> the Gershonite. <S%H1649><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jehieli, <S%H3172><s%> Zetham <S%H2241><s%> and Joel <S%H3100><s%> his brother, <S%H251><s%> had charge <S%H5921><s%> of the treasures <S%H214><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>
As for the Amramites, <S%H6020><s%> the Izharites, <S%H3325><s%> the Hebronites, <S%H2276><s%> and the Uzzielites, <S%H5817><s%>
Shebuel <S%H7619><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Gershom, <S%H1647><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Moses, <S%H4872><s%> was officer <S%H5057><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the treasures. <S%H214><s%>

And his relatives <S%H251><s%> by Eliezer <S%H461><s%> [were] Rehabiah <S%H7345><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Jeshaiah <S%H9198><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Joram <S%H3141><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Zichri <S%H2147><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> and Shelomoth <S%H8013><s%> his son. <S%H1121><s%>

This <S%H1931><s%> Shelomoth <S%H8013><s%> and his relatives <S%H251><s%> had charge <S%H5921><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the treasures <S%H214><s%> of the dedicated <S%H6944><s%> gifts, <S%H6944><s%> which <S%H834><s%> King <S%H4428><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> and the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers' [households,] the commanders <S%H8269><s%> of thousands <S%H505><s%> and hundreds, <S%H3967><s%> and commanders <S%H8269><s%> of the army, <S%H6635><s%> had dedicated. <S%H6942><s%>
They dedicated <S%H6942><s%> part of the spoil <S%H7998><s%> won in battles <S%H4421><s%> to repair <S%H2388><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> that Samuel <S%H8050><s%> the seer <S%H9536><s%> had dedicated <S%H6942><s%> and Saul <S%H7586><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kish, <S%H7027><s%> Abner <S%H74><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ner <S%H5369><s%> and Joab <S%H3097><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zeruiah, <S%H6870><s%> everyone <S%H3605><s%> who had dedicated <S%H6942><s%> [anything, all of this] was in the care <S%H3027><s%> of Shelomoth <S%H8019><s%> and his relatives. <S%H251><s%>

As for the Izharites, <S%H3325><s%> Chenaniah <S%H3663><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> were [assigned] to outside <S%H2435><s%> duties <S%H4399><s%> for Israel, <S%H3478><s%> as officers <S%H7860><s%> and judges. <S%H8199><s%>

As for the Hebronites, <S%H2276><s%> Hashabiah <S%H2811><s%> and his relatives, <S%H251><s%> 1700 capable <S%H2428><s%> men, <S%H1121><s%> had charge of the affairs <S%H6486><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> west <S%H4628><s%> of the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> the work <S%H4399><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> and the service <S%H5656><s%> of the king. <S%H4428><s%>

As for the Hebronites, <S%H2276><s%> Jerijah <S%H3404><s%> the chief <S%H7218><s%> (these Hebronites <S%H2276><s%> were investigated <S%H1875><s%> according to their genealogies <S%H8435><s%> and fathers' [households,] in the fortieth <S%H705><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of David's reign, <S%H4438><s%> and men <S%H1368><s%> of outstanding <S%H1368><s%> capability <S%H2428><s%> were found <S%H4672><s%> among them at Jazer <S%H3270><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%>)

and his relatives, <S%H251><s%> capable <S%H2428><s%> men, <S%H1121><s%> [were] 2700 in number, heads <S%H7218><s%> of fathers' [households.] And King <S%H4428><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> made <S%H6485><s%> them overseers <S%H6485><s%> of the Reubenites, <S%H7206><s%> the Gadites <S%H1425><s%> and the half-tribe of the Manassites <S%H4520><s%> concerning all <S%H3605><s%> the affairs <S%H1697><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> and of the king. <S%H4428><s%>
